result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court for Dewaun Jerome Hill.  Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial.  Defense moves to withdraw as counsel.  Discussions held.  Case passed. 
... 
Case recalled.  Same appearances. 
Defense withdraws motion to withdraw.  Attorney Cerniglia remains as counsel of record for the defendant.  Defense requests a plea/sentencing date.  Court set date as requested.  Court vacated jury trial set for 10-24-2022.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 17, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
Received and Filed:  State's Motion in Limine.
Received and Filed.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter of support for defendant.
Letter from defendant.  (Dewaun J. Hill - #463329, Dodge Correctional Institution, PO Box 700, Waupun WI 53963-0700).
Received and Filed:  State's Response to Defendant's Motion to Dismiss.
Received and Filed:  Defendant's motion to dismiss

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill not in court, in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for status conference.  Defense withdrew speedy trial demand.  Court set final pretrial and jury trial dates upon request from the defense.  Court ordered all substantive motions to be filed by 8-22-22 and all responses to be filed by 9-19-22 or they will be deemed waived.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.

HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE ON DACAST.

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill not in court, in custody.  Eric Bashirian appeared for the State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney Jacob Corr.
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill in court with Attorney Michael J Cerniglia; both appear by video.  Defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer N. Zaragoza.   Court took judicial notice of 17CF5164. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND. 
Expires 7-19-2022

Attorney Michael J Cerniglia in court, defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill not in court, in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Attorney Cerniglia has intake court and needs time to meet with his client. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.

Defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Dewaun Jerome Hill in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dewaun Jerome Hill appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
